feed.title: The SUBSTATION
feed.subtitle: The SUBSTATION is a unique large-scale multi-purpose gallery, performance space and dance studio for artists of every kind, in Newport, Melbourne, Australia.

entry.title: Newport Folk Festival
entry.content: NEWPORT FOLK FESTIVAL is an annual community event held in late June/early July across various venues in Newport. Organised by the Newport Fiddle and Folk Club, the festival aims to bring a range of music styles and performers to interact with the local community of Newport. The SUBSTATION has participated in hosting musicians for the festival since 2016.
entry.summary: NEWPORT FOLK FESTIVAL is an annual community event held in late June/early July across various venues in Newport. Organised by the Newport Fiddle and Folk Club, the festival aims to bring a range of music styles and performers to interact with the local community of Newport. The SUBSTATION has participated in hosting musicians for the festival since 2016.

entry.title: Hobsons Bay Battle of the Bands

link.title: Hobsons Bay Battle of the Bands

entry.content:
Hobsons Bay City Council, Hobsons Bay UP, Leaders of Today and Westside FReeZA committees run a broad range of events for young people in Hobsons Bay, including Battle of the Bands.

Hosted at The SUBSTATION, Battle of the Bands 2017 presented a number of young artists including Loose Tooth, Annaliese Rose, Cosmic Goat Farmerr, Plaza-trg, Arkadiann, Hollow Decemberer and Josh Ten.
entry.summary: Hobsons Bay City Council, Hobsons Bay UP, Leaders of Today and Westside FReeZA committees run a broad range of events for young people in Hobsons Bay, including Battle of the Bands. Hosted at The SUBSTATION, Battle of the Bands 2017 presented a number of young artists including Loose Tooth, Annaliese Rose, Cosmic Goat Farmerr, Plaza-trg, Arkadiann, Hollow Decemberer and Josh Ten.

entry.title: Hobsons Bay City Council Business Breakfast

link.title: Hobsons Bay City Council Business Breakfast

entry.content: Hobsons Bay City Council Business Breakfast is a popular business event held annually at The SUBSTATION. This not-for-profit event creates an opportunity to meet with other business leaders and influencers from across Hobsons Bay and beyond.
entry.summary: Hobsons Bay City Council Business Breakfast is a popular business event held annually at The SUBSTATION. This not-for-profit event creates an opportunity to meet with other business leaders and influencers from across Hobsons Bay and beyond.

entry.title: Hobsons Bay City Council Library School Holiday Program

link.title: Hobsons Bay City Council Library School Holiday Program

entry.content: The Hobsons Bay Library operates a holiday program each school holiday period for young people aged 12 to 25 who live, study or work in the Hobsons Bay area. Young people have the opportunity to participate in recreational activities in environments that are safe, supervised and fun.
entry.summary: The Hobsons Bay Library operates a holiday program each school holiday period for young people aged 12 to 25 who live, study or work in the Hobsons Bay area. Young people have the opportunity to participate in recreational activities in environments that are safe, supervised and fun.

entry.title: Solicitudes
entry.content:
Solicitudes is a collection of works by artist Lawrence English, drawn from a wider interrogation into the shifting sonic environment of protest over the past 50 years. 

Solicitudes uses pulled images, focusing on the hand as a primary tool (along with voice) for sonic activation during protest. The works also suggest a reading of certain handheld technologies of amplification such as telephones, weapons and instruments. 

Solicitudes’ images resonate with latent sound; sounds and acoustic spaces that permeate our subconscious, exploding beyond confines of the visual realm. Within each frame sonic spectres manifest, haunting us. 

Presented by The SUBSTATION.
entry.summary: Solicitudes is a collection of works by artist Lawrence English, drawn from a wider interrogation into the shifting sonic environment of protest over the past 50 years.

entry.title: Altona Hockey Club gala
entry.content: Altona Hockey Club was established in 1932 and has maintained a strong sporting presence in the broader Hobson’s Bay Community, with the junior players representing over 30 different regional schools. In November 2016 The SUBSTATION hosted a gala event to raise funds for the not-for-profit club.
entry.summary: Altona Hockey Club was established in 1932 and has maintained a strong sporting presence in the broader Hobson’s Bay Community, with the junior players representing over 30 different regional schools. In November 2016 The SUBSTATION hosted a gala event to raise funds for the not-for-profit club.
